```{r setup}
library(OSButils)
library(magrittr)
library(tibble)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggrepel)
```

```{r}
(testing_dataset <- datasets::CO2 %>% 
  as_tibble() %>% 
   mutate(Plant = gsub("^.{2}", "", Plant)) %>% 
  group_by(Type, Plant) %>% 
  summarise(Sum.Uptake = sum(uptake)) )
```

```{r}
testing_dataset %>% 
  osb_SlopePlot(changes_in = Sum.Uptake, for_the = Plant, across = Type) +
  scale_color_brewer(type = "qual")
```

```{r}
testing_dataset %>% osb_DotPlot(changes_in = Sum.Uptake, for_the = Plant, across = Type) + scale_color_brewer(type = "qual")
```
